body:
Damn... I made an account specifically just to favorite this best exhibitionist series. Lol 

If you guys can recommend another exhib series with similar art style and story please do. (I've checked all the artists below, only smac's and charu's art fits my cup of tea but sadly the story isn't)
i think this is one of the best series for exhibitionism. compared to guglielmo, i disliked him because he always using weird pose plus unnecessary gag.
Don't forget guglielmo. But this is probably the best exhibitionseries. So many miss out haha
@Vanilla_Hunter this is definitely one of the best! If you like this genre you might wanna check the doujins created by artist 'smac', 'charu', or 'the seiji'  -- if you haven't already.
Also wtf is up with dissappearance of the men who have sex with her It's like someone obliterated them off the face of the earth Still a excellent read tho @RoshutsuHunter I completely agree with you
I've got a thing for exhibitionist women and I've gotta tell you, this is probably the best exhibitionism series I've ever read
This should get more attention. Such erotica
What the hell happened to all those men? xD
It is 2020 and I can confirm Cheating/NTR is still a shit fetish for shit people
Reminder. Cheating/NTR is a shit fetish for shit people
Maybe she's got aids, so that's why the men who fucked her all disappeared •_ゝ•
Every guys this slut fuck went AWOL. Her current boyfriend too would dissapear after he fuck her.Then she would make all the men dissapear by fucking them
Excelente historia, ojala saquen mas de estas. Y muchas gracias al traductor.
